Actions.Name: Marching Pipes
Actions.Effects: The [name] and a single ally in range 2 may dash 2 before this attack.

Actions.Name: Dancing Curse
Actions.Description: The [name] curses a foe in range, marking them. While marked, after any ability resolves that allows that character to dash, fly, or teleport, all the [name]'s allies everywhere may dash 2, and that foe becomes dazed.

Actions.Name: Hot Foot
Actions.Description: The [name] chooses a foe in range. That foe must move at least 5 spaces during its next turn, or else sacrifice 5. Then, this effect ends.

Actions.Name: Swirling Leaves
Actions.Description: The [name] puts down a terrain effect in range. Characters that enter the space can fly 3 spaces as an effect, but only once a turn.
